title: Me Kra Yɛ Komm: Aw'rade Wɔ W'afa

lines: Me kra yɛ komm: Aw'rade wɔ w' afa,
Fa boasetɔ soa wo yaw 'sɛnnua no;
MaW' Nyame kwan ma ɔnhyehyɛ w'akwan,
Nsakrae biara mu no ɔnsea da;
Me kra yɛ komm: Wo s'ro 'Damfo pa no
Bɛma woanya awiei pa wɔ haw mu.
Me kra yɛ komm: Wo Nyame no kura
Daakyem' sɛnea W'ayɛ nea atwan no;
Me kra yɛ komm: 'srɔkye ne ahum nim
Nea Odii wɔn so ha b're bi no nne.
Me kra yɛ komm: na b're no rebɛn sɛ
Brč a basmtu, yaw ne suro 'twan kɔ,
'W'rɛhow asa; dɔ mu dɛw aba bio
Me kra yɛ komm: nusu ne nsakrae twā a,
B'rč a wɔahy'ra yɛn no, yebehyia mu bio.
